quote: ... time is a master of ceremonies who always ends up putting us in our rightful place, we advance, stop, and retreat according to his orders, our mistake lies in imagining that we can catch him out.
quote_letters: TIME IS A MASTER OF CEREMONIES WHO ALWAYS ENDS UP PUTTING US IN OUR RIGHTFUL PLACE WE ADVANCE STOP AND RETREAT ACCORDING TO HIS ORDERS OUR MISTAKE LIES IN IMAGINING THAT WE CAN CATCH HIM OUT
